name: BARRAGE / 铁幕
description:
-This is a Simple Shooooooooooooooooting Game.
　　-"Aiming"is not Included in this game.Just be Rambo.
　　-Swiftly Attack/Defence Stance Switch.

　　Four Weapon Unlocked:
　　-ZSU-23-4"Shilka"Autocannon
　　-40mm"Bofors"Cannon
　　-88mm Flak36 Cannon
　　-M48"Chaparral"Missile

　　Face the Combination Attack of:
　　-V-1 Ballistic Missile
　　-Ju-87 Dive Bomber
　　-Do-17 Medium Bomber
　　-Fritz-X Guided Bomb
　　-Me-264 Heavy Bomber
　　-Zepplin Armoured Airship

　　Don't Ask me Why You can use Cold War weapon hitting WWII Aircraft,They are already used to it.
　　Leaderboard is online now,Enjoy.
